title: Zero Day Attack
overview: A candidate from the pro-war faction wins the presidential election, leading to an agitated situation in the Taiwan Strait. An unexpected incident occurs when a Yun-8 reconnaissance aircraft crosses the South China Sea and crashes into the Pacific Ocean off the east coast of Taiwan. Under the pretext of search and rescue, the Chinese side mobilized many naval and air forces. On the Zero Day of the PLA's central landing, as unrest within Taiwan escalates, the situation enters its final countdown.
